title: FPS/Lag issue when using pings on 7.17
body:
I've been getting a really weird issue lately I never noticed it before this patch but I'm not sure if it started after updating exactly. 

When I'm in game I usually have steady ping and fps, and I play with ethernet plugged in. Recently I've had strange lag where my game briefly freezes like the frames have stopped whenever I issue a ping using alt/g/v such as to ping targeting something. It doesn't happen when I use hotkey pings which I have set to other keys. It doesn't occur again when pinging multiple times. The delay time also can vary, sometimes its just a few frames but others can be a whole second or so. 

Any ideas on what this could be, or how I could manage it? I tried looking to see if anyone else had the same issue but didn't find anything. 
Thanks c:

replies.body: There could be some bad game assets specifically failing to render properly when using pings.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch might help fix this up.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure, though!
